nodes.text: Azumel was the language of the Azumel species. In 10 BBY, the Azumel Argus Panox spoke in Azumel while playing sabacc in the Lodge on the planet Vandor.

Azumel first appeared in the 2018 Anthology Series film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. It was first identified as Azumel in the video "Every Language in Star Wars," part of the Star Wars By the Numbers series, which released in 2019 on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel.
